text: Group D of the 2022 FIFA World Cup will be from 22 to 30 November 2022. The teams in the group are France, Australia, Denmark and Tunisia. The top two teams will go to the round of 16. ==Teams== Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance FIFA Rankings FIFA Rankings Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance March 2022 October 2022 D1 1 UEFA UEFA Group D winners 13 November 2021 16th 2018 Winners (1998, 2018) 3 4 D2 4 AFC AFC v CONMEBOL play-off winners 13 June 2022 6th 2018 Round of 16 (2006) 42 38 D3 2 UEFA UEFA Group F winners 12 October 2021 6th 2018 Quarter-finals (1998) 11 10 D4 3 CAF CAF Third Round winners 29 March 2022 6th 2018 Group stage (1978, 1998, 2002, 2006, 2018) 35 30 Notes ==Standings== In the round of 16: * The winners of Group D will play the runners-up of Group C. * The runners-up of Group D will play the winners of Group C. ==Matches== All times listed are local, AST (UTC+3). ===Denmark vs Tunisia=== ===France vs Australia=== ===Tunisia vs Australia=== ===France vs Denmark=== ===Australia vs Denmark=== ===Tunisia vs France=== ==Discipline== Fair play points will be used as tiebreakers if the teams are tied after the overall and head-to-head rules. These points are based on yellow and red cards given to a team. The points are: *first yellow card: minus 1 point; *indirect red card (second yellow card): minus 3 points; *direct red card: minus 4 points; *yellow card and direct red card: minus 5 points; Team Match 1 Match 1 Match 1 Match 1 Match 2 Match 2 Match 2 Match 2 Match 3 Match 3 Match 3 Match 3 Points Team Points 1 –1 3 2 –5 2 2 1 –5 1 3 1 –5 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2022 FIFA World Cup
title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Group D
